org.rakiura.cpn
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  org.rakiura.cpn.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, NetElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractArc, BasicNet, Place, Transition
public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetElement

Basic abstract implementation of the NetElement. This is the most primitive abstract building block of the Net.
